title: AnularJS Intro
desc: Angular JS is a JavaScript framework that extends HTML and is for single page apps

title: Expressions
desc: AJS binds data to HTML using expressions

title: Modules
desc: A module defines the app and is a container for different parts of the applicaiton. The module is a container for the applicaiton controller.

title: Directives
desc: You can extend HTML with new attributes via directives.

title: Model (ng-model)
desc: The ng-model directive binds the value of HTML controls to the applicaiton.

title: Controllers
desc: Controllers control the data of AJS app.

title: Scope
desc: The scope binds teh view and controller. It is an object that has properties and methods. It is also available for both view and controller.

title: Filters
desc: AJS provides numerous filters to format data.

title: Services
desc: There are many services to help assist you. One popular is the $http for server requests.

title: Ajax / Http
desc: Use $http service for reading data from servers.

title: Tables
desc: Using ng-repeat directive is useful to loop through objects/arrays.

title: Select Boxes
desc: You can create dropdown lists for items in an array or object

title: SQL
desc: You can display data from the database but it needs to be in JSON.

title: HTML DOM
desc: AJS has directives for binding app data to the html elements
Event directives including blue, click, cut, dblclick, mouse, key etc...

title: Forms
desc: You can bind data to forms and input elements.

title: Form Validation
desc: You can also validate data in forms.

title: API
desc: Angular has a list of global application programming interface methods.

title: Includes
desc: Use include to import external html files.

title: Animations
desc: AJS has different types of animations to visually appeal your apps.

title: Other Resources
desc: Angular JS website, References to directives and examples
